name: One Night at Lordrum
description:
My solo submission to the GMTK 2021 Jam. Very last minute and extremely barebones, but feels good to finish! Written in C++, uses raylib. All art / sounds made in the time period. Not proud of the game, but happy with diving into raylib for the first time.

Keys:  WASD. Nothing else.

[No need to read on if you plan on playing, the game provides this info]

The caves of lordrum are a bizarre and often wildly misunderstood set of man-built structures.

Once used for pagan rituals, most of its fame these days comes from one night in 1844.

On that night shines a moon so bright, bathing the entrance in such light that it gets the attention of two troublemaker s from Chelter’s field. Later that night, Dorothy finds herself in these caves illuminated solely by the moon, wishing for a way out.
